summary: This document is a telephone call detail record (CDR) produced by AT&T in response to a query on June 18, 2019. It lists calls to and from the target number (561) 308-0282 between January 1, 2002, and December 31, 2006, showing numerous connections to various phone numbers across the United States.

events.title: AT&T Records Query
events.description: AT&T was queried for historical call detail records for the phone number (561) 308-0282, covering the period from January 1, 2002, to December 31, 2006.

keyFacts: The target phone number for the records query is (561) 308-0282, an area code associated with Palm Beach County, Florida.
The records span from 2002 to 2006, a period covering Jeffrey Epstein's initial arrest and prosecution in Florida.
The document shows hundreds of calls to and from a wide array of phone numbers across the country, indicating extensive communication activity.
The record was produced on June 18, 2019, which was during the investigation by the Southern District of New York (SDNY) into Epstein.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY evidence collection (SDNY_GM_ series).
